instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Acer LA-B991P - Turns on, backlight, sometimes brief picture, turns off.
threads.message:
Hi Guys,

Trying my luck here with an Acer board someone dropped off. I don't even know where to begin with it.

It turns on (fan spins), backlight comes on, it sometimes (if it's been off for a long time) gives the bios splash screen, then it turns off. Won't turn on until I disconnect the power for a little while and then it repeats.

It has no liquid damage and looks really clean and tidy.


Any suggestions appreciated!

threads.title: Acer LA-B991P - Turns on, backlight, sometimes brief picture, turns off.
threads.message: ive had this problem before, it was the gpu, have a look on laptop-schematics and see if you can get schematics for it, probably cant get a board view for it tho

threads.title: Acer LA-B991P - Turns on, backlight, sometimes brief picture, turns off.
threads.message:
As in a similar problem to the 820-2915?

Probably not worth spending too much time on it.

threads.title: Acer LA-B991P - Turns on, backlight, sometimes brief picture, turns off.
threads.message: for me, I take a non refundable deposit to cover schematics and donor boards, therefore I only lose my time if it turns out not fixable
